name: 2017 1st International Conference of Smart World
content: Welcome to learn more about The 1st International Conference of Smart World 2017 (ICSW-2017). The conference, with the theme of "Intelligent Innovation, Integrated Development", will be held during September 25-27, 2017 in Xiâ€™an, China. ICSW-2017 aims to grasp the development trend of manufacturing industry, promote the development of smart manufacturing, and offers a great opportunity for scientists, scholars, engineers and practitioners, at any stage in their career, to present, develop their own research, and network with other experts. And the program covers a wide range of themes including Artificial Intelligence, Robotics, 3D Printing and Additive Manufacturing, IT and ICT, Advanced Materials, High-end Manufacturing Equipment Industries, and Factory of the Future, etc. ICSW-2017 in Xi'an will also offer its attendees an unforgettable cultural experience. Xi'an enjoys the title of "A Natural Museum of History". It has been the most popular tourist city in China and the world owing to its brilliant historical and cultural relics. And there would also be an opportunity to travel to other Chinese cities and present lectures. The organizing committee of ICSW-2017 is very pleased to invite the scientists from worldwide to submit papers and present an academic speech (20-25 min total including speaking time and 5 min discussion) at this conference.
